description:
Provides a Load Balancer Rule resource to add content forwarding policies for Load Balancer backend resource.
 
~> **Note** The Load Balancer Rule can only be define while the `protocol` of lb listener is one of HTTP and HTTPS. In addition, should set one of `domain` and `path` if defined.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

BackendIds.description: The IDs of the backend servers where rule applies, this argument is populated base on the `backend_id` responded from `lb_attachment` create.

Domain.description: The domain of content forward matching fields. `path` and `domain` cannot coexist. `path` and `domain` must be filled in one.

ListenerId.description: The ID of a listener server.

LoadBalancerId.description: The ID of a load balancer.

Path.description: The path of Content forward matching fields. `path` and `domain` cannot coexist. `path` and `domain` must be filled in one.
